title: A Shared table with Stephanie Alexander
creator_credit: John Smith, Stuart Menzies, Tony Wright, ABC-TV (Australia), On the Boil Productions and December Films
brief_description: This tape is a compilation of the seven part series screened on ABC TV which followed renowned chef Stephanie Alexander on a culinary journey across different regions of Australia. At each destination Stephanie, with the assistance of fellow chef Elena Bonnici, prepares a meal from local produce. By doing so she reveals the diversity of local producers, and the ease with which these ingredients can be incorporated into a delicious meal.
